positions.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: - Headed the portfolio of Public Relations and EAD-LSM Coordinator while being in charge of training 59 associate members- Responsible for heading event management, and the publicity of Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive and Local Startup Meet, which are month-long flagship initiatives of E-Cell- Oversaw the conduction of 22 pan India drives for EAD and pitching sessions encompassing 268 startups and 36 investors across LSM-  Led to year-on-year growth of 176% in the number of attendees and increased the number of cities to 22 from 9 in the last year- Led the publicity of flagship initiatives through more than 50 campaigns which was an increase of 100% from last year- GES 2022 witnessed the highest participation in terms of the number of colleges reached, an increase of 17% from the previous year
positions.title: Senior Manager - EAD/LSM Coordinator | Public Relations
positions.description_html:
- Headed the portfolio of Public Relations and EAD-LSM Coordinator while being in charge of training 59 associate members
- Responsible for heading event management, and the publicity of Entrepreneurship Awareness Drive and Local Startup Meet, which are month-long flagship initiatives of E-Cell
- Oversaw the conduction of 22 pan India drives for EAD and pitching sessions encompassing 268 startups and 36 investors across LSM
- Led to year-on-year growth of 176% in the number of attendees and increased the number of cities to 22 from 9 in the last year
- Led the publicity of flagship initiatives through more than 50 campaigns which was an increase of 100% from last year
- GES 2022 witnessed the highest participation in terms of the number of colleges reached, an increase of 17% from the previous year

positions.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: - Publicity Head: Lead a team of 50+ GES Interns to publicize and market the first-ever online edition of the Global Entrepreneurship Summit (Year 2021) through numerous newspaper articles, social media pages, and other organizations throughout the country to get the highest ever participation number of 2300+ students, professors, startups, and professionals.- Conducted the first-ever online edition of 'Connect The Dots' - a conference of 10+ E-Cells from various parts of the country aimed at developing better communication and discussing common ground problems under GES 2021.- Managed a team of 250+ GES and campus ambassadors to ensure a nation-wide diverse audience from 250+ colleges.- Events Team - Organized multiple events from scratch like Entrepreneurial Finance workshop, Business Storytelling, Unreal Engine Gaming-tech workshop, etc within GES 2021.
positions.title: Associate Manager - Public Relations | Events | Startups & Alumni Relations
positions.description_html:
- Publicity Head: Lead a team of 50+ GES Interns to publicize and market the first-ever online edition of the Global Entrepreneurship Summit (Year 2021) through numerous newspaper articles, social media pages, and other organizations throughout the country to get the highest ever participation number of 2300+ students, professors, startups, and professionals.
- Conducted the first-ever online edition of 'Connect The Dots' - a conference of 10+ E-Cells from various parts of the country aimed at developing better communication and discussing common ground problems under GES 2021.
- Managed a team of 250+ GES and campus ambassadors to ensure a nation-wide diverse audience from 250+ colleges.
- Events Team - Organized multiple events from scratch like Entrepreneurial Finance workshop, Business Storytelling, Unreal Engine Gaming-tech workshop, etc within GES 2021.

positions.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: - Conducted the Local Startups Meet, personally fixing deals with 5 incubation centers as outreach partners that resulted in the participation of 32 startups and 7 investors, in the Health and Wellness sector from prominent venture capital firms like Blume Ventures and Unitus Capital

positions.subtitle: Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: - I was involved in successfully conducting the Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2020 at IIT Kharagpur.Global Entrepreneurship Summit(GES) is the annual flagship event of the Entrepreneurship Cell, IITKharagpur which witnesses events like guest lectures, technical workshops, start-up camp,conferences, online events, and competitions etc.- Responsible for the publicity of GES 2020 in the city of Indore, media coverage was providedthrough 8+ media articles.- Worked in the Core Team under the Public Relations portfolio and managed all participants and portfolio related events during the Summit.
positions.title: GES Intern
positions.description_html:
- I was involved in successfully conducting the Global Entrepreneurship Summit 2020 at IIT Kharagpur.
Global Entrepreneurship Summit(GES) is the annual flagship event of the Entrepreneurship Cell, IIT
Kharagpur which witnesses events like guest lectures, technical workshops, start-up camp,
conferences, online events, and competitions etc.
- Responsible for the publicity of GES 2020 in the city of Indore, media coverage was provided
through 8+ media articles.
- Worked in the Core Team under the Public Relations portfolio and managed all participants and portfolio related events during the Summit.

positions.subtitle: The Scholars' Avenue
positions.description: - The Scholars' Avenue is the student-run campus media body of the institute. We strive to bring the latest happenings across the campus and outside of relevance to the view of over 40,000 followers including various alumni and the current batch of students.- We do this using our Facebook Page and various print issues that we release throughout the year. We also undertake projects like Internpedia, TnPedia which help students in preparing for their ideal portfolio during campus selections.
positions.title: Reporter
positions.description_html:
- The Scholars' Avenue is the student-run campus media body of the institute. We strive to bring the latest happenings across the campus and outside of relevance to the view of over 40,000 followers including various alumni and the current batch of students.
- We do this using our Facebook Page and various print issues that we release throughout the year. We also undertake projects like Internpedia, TnPedia which help students in preparing for their ideal portfolio during campus selections.

experience.title: Founding Member
experience.description: - In true KGP’s spirit of helping our community to overcome challenges and thrive, Co-founded CDC Companion, which is a one-stop centralized platform to help students with their CDC internship preparation- In a short span the platform acquired more than 700 registered users and around 1200 blog views

experience.title: General Secretary | Students' Welfare
experience.description: - Played an important role in smoothening the recalling process of the sophomores post-pandemic- Organized the first-ever Intra-Hall Tournament which included 5 events across the domains of Sports and Cultural- Led the Student Mentorship Initiative in Nehru Hall of Residence aimed at the 2nd year students,  to aid them during their IIT Kharagpur journey.

experience.title: Candidate - Vice President, Technology Students' Gymkhana (2022-23)
experience.description: - 1 of the 3 Vice Presidential Candidates in the annual Technology Students' Gymkhana Elections (2022-23) representing 2700+ students out of the 7315 voting individuals from 14000+ people of the Institute's General Body- Drafted and presented my Statement of Purpose in front of over 2000 people including impact-driven proposals addressing and solving issues involving every aspect of all the spheres of campus life majorly including Students' Welfare, Research culture, Entrepreneurial activities, etc.

experience.title: Analyst
experience.description: CENSIE Capital Partners is a boutique Investment Banking firm, focused on startup fundraising in the range of $1M - $20M across Seed to Series C stages. CENSIE is recognized as one of the most active investment banking firms in India featured by India's Premium "Venture Intelligence League Tables Jan-Sep 2020". My role included closely working with early stage start-up founders and assist them in fundraising-focused storytelling and building stellar pitch decks making them fund-ready.

experience.title: Officiating Secretary | Technology
experience.description: - Selected as a student representative from a large pool of applications to preside over the end-to-end organization of institute technology events to foster technical extracurricular activities among 13,000+ students of IIT Kharagpur- Managed all the aspects from funds to logistics along with 3 fellow Secretaries to successfully organize 7 Intra IIT events in a duration of 3 months with 1000+ participants from 21 Halls of residence- Coordinated with institute staff for handling the overall technology budget allocated for club activities, technology events, and competitions under the supervision of General Secretaries - Managed the Bronze winning contingent of IIT Kharagpur at the 9th Inter IIT Tech Meet 2021

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Providing quality consultancy services to social organizations, NGOs, socially conscious startups & small-scale companies. Creating greater social impact through innovative, sustainable & practical solutions. Gaining leadership skills, consulting experience & professional etiquette with a chance to drive value through the quality of collaborative work.- Responsible for developing a sustainable business model and GTM Strategy for an NGO venture to help marginalized women- Onboarded several high-profile clients as a part of the Client Acquisition & Strategy team. Worked for an NGO to formulate strategic solutions for onboarding more corporate partners and volunteers- Designed a Binary-MLM business plan to establish a direct selling company and launching a plant-based air purifier in the Indian Market
